name: Misadventure (TeamSteve)
description:
Help this pirate navigate his way to the secret of a lifetime!

In Misadventure, you control a pirate as he hops off his ship, swims through the mine-infested waters, and discovers a legend lost to the tides of time.

This was a project for a college studio course, at Lawrence Technological University, in Southfield, MI. The course simulated the real video game project process as best as it could over the course of the spring semester. The game was presented at LTUX, 04/20/2019.

Not an overly ambitious game, but it served as an important step in learning the game-making process.
